price: 65. Wherein they will abide for ever, and they will find neither a Walî (a protector) nor a helper.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
